Package etomica.modules.sam

Class WallPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.math.geometry.Plane
      • etomica.modules.sam.WallPlane

  • public class WallPlane
extends Plane
    Wrap a P1WCAWall and make it look like a Plane. A boatload of plane methods aren't overriden (there are a lot of them!) and calling them will return garbage (or perhaps even crash). DisplayBoxCanvasG3DSys only calls distanceTo and getD.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
